title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When attempting to import a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed properly and the original image is still being displayed instead.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still being displayed instead of the newly imported image.
EB: The expected behavior is that after importing a new image into the layout, the newly imported image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Import the newly renamed 'image1.jpg' into the layout view again.
5. Verify that the original image is still being displayed instead of the newly imported image.
